Reviews.Title: “Happy to have found this Hotel in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: yuvarani
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 discos heard noise love comfortable cleanstaff nice breakfast plus mouthwatering chinese restaurant look forward definately feb india near airport taxi
